bike.description: P. Series A1 Premium Aluminum, double-butted w/ ORE DT, forged HT/ISCG BB/chainstay yoke/horizontal dropouts, integrated chain tensioner and axle carrier, multispeed hardware, disc only, 6mm offset rear triangle
